DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study analyse effect multicomponent intervention , apply one scholar semester , body composition , strength , flexibility , cardiorespiratory fitness , lipid metabolic profile , body image student sixth ninth grade . This non-randomized controlled design . Approximately 568 schoolchildren grade sixth ninth recruit 2 public secondary school Florianópolis , Brazil . The main component intervention entitle `` MEXA-SE '' ( move ) consist implementation three physical education class per week aerobic exercise , strength flexibility activity . In addition , play activity school recess , educational activity physical activity , sedentary behaviour , eat habit body image perform . Data collection perform immediately 14 week intervention . The primary outcome include body composition , strength , flexibility , cardiorespiratory fitness , lipid metabolic profile , body image . Other variable include : physical activity level , sedentary behaviour , blood pressure level . Other component lifestyle ( e.g. , eat habit ) , psychological ( e.g. , self-rated health ) also evaluate participant . Descriptive analysis , two-way ANOVA mixed model ANCOVA apply within comparison group , premise test met . The level significance study 5 % two-tailed test .
DOC.brief_title: School-based Multicomponent Intervention Physical Fitness Related Health Body Image
DOC.criteria: Students volunteer participation ; Students regularly enrol 6th 9th grade Florianópolis municipal school system . Students grade ; Students dropout school ; Students incomplete data baseline end 14 week ; Students absence school day data collection ; Students refuse participate data collection intervention ;
